name: Island of 16 sisters Part 1
description:
One day Robert wakes up on a cold pavement in the middle of a small town on an unknown island. Soon he finds out he's not alone. There are 16 beautiful girls and a mysterious Father living on the island. What's the secret behind all of this?

The Island of 16 sisters is the fourth series of GameStylus adventure games. This time the main character is not a young witch, a mutant nor a space treasure hunter, but a young man - Robert...

Features:
* Entirely in English
* Completely free of charge
* Classic point and click adventure game optimized for tablets and smartphones
* Prerendered graphics
* SuperHelp for quick help in the game

Help: In the menu you can get help with any location in the game, find your collected items, turn the music and sounds on/off and restart the game.
